1: I trust in your faithfulness to answer my prayers.
2: I seek understanding and grace in every interaction.
3: I rise above challenges and embrace the light of life.
4: I find strength and renewal in my spirit.
5: I reflect on the beauty and wisdom of creation.
6: I reach out, seeking fulfillment and connection.
7: I seek your presence, trusting in your support and strength.
8: I trust in your loving kindness and seek your guidance every day.
9: I seek refuge and find strength in the Lord.
10: I embrace goodness and follow the guidance of my spirit.
11: I am uplifted and guided towards goodness with purpose.
12: I trust in your mercy to support and uplift me.
